Class IdTokenVerifierAndParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • IdTokenVerifierAndParser

  • public class IdTokenVerifierAndParser
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will take the id token of the user and verify that they are a registered google email. Part of this class requires a Google client id that can be retrieved from Google APIs.
    Author:
    Gina
